player

Class GeneHuntFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.GeneHuntFactory

  • public class GeneHuntFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to create both AI and GUI players. By default it makes only Mr X an AI player and everyone else a GUI player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneHuntFactory

        public GeneHuntFactory(ScotlandYardApplication application,
                       ThreadCommunicator threadCom)
        Constructs a new GeneHuntFactory object.
        Parameters:
        application - the ScotlandYardApplication that has started the game.
        threadCom - the ThreadCommunicator object to communicate with the Event handling thread (GUI Thread).

      • GeneHuntFactory

        public GeneHuntFactory(ScotlandYardApplication application,
                       ThreadCommunicator threadCom,
                       java.util.Map<Colour,GeneHuntFactory.PlayerType> typeMap,
                       java.lang.String graphFilename)
        Constructs a new GeneHuntFactory object.
        Parameters:
        application - the ScotlandYardApplication that has started the game.
        threadCom - the ThreadCommunicator object to communicate with the Event handling thread (GUI Thread).
        typeMap - the Map that decides who should be AI players and who should be GUI players.
        graphFilename - the path to the file containing the Graph.

    • Method Detail

      • player

        public Player player(Colour colour,
                     ScotlandYardView view,
                     java.lang.String graphFilename)
        Returns the correct Player for the specified player in the game.
        Parameters:
        colour - the Colour of the player in the game.
        view - the ScotlandYardView containing information about the game.
        graphFilename - the path to the file containing the Graph.
        Returns:
        the correct Player for the specified player in the game.

      • ready

        public void ready()
        Called when the game is ready. Updates the UI to start the game.

      • getSpectators

        public java.util.List<Spectator> getSpectators(ScotlandYardView view)
        Returns a List of Spectators of the game. The only spectator is the GUI.
        Returns:
        a List of Spectators of the game.

      • finish

        public void finish()
        Called when the game ends. Updates the UI to end the game.
